Title: EasySL
Description:
It provide a easy and usefull solution for making a rich client application base on Silverlight 2.0
and contain 4 part :Web Layer, Data Service, Business Service and remoting Server. 
It's contain a lots of custom control as visualpager,custom window,drag&drop and so on.
